summary: Be that peg-legged rum smuggler you always wanted to be!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a pirate\'s cutlass into the world of Skyrim. You may find the sword lying nearby the smelter at Warmaiden\'s (I hope you know where that is...)

This first version simply adds the sword with a basic texture. It\'s a bit sloppy right now, but later versions will clean it up and add even more content for those interested in becoming a nordic pirate.
author: Jetdrive
